name: Lethal Bully Land
description:
Welcome to Lethal Bully Land! Here you can see Slimes, Slimes, and more Slimes...

Oh my, it would seem that we got ourselves a Slime Infestation. Quick, you need to get rid of them!

In this game inspired by the design of the Bullies from Mario 64, control a little robot and clear multiple Slime-filled levels using Explosions, Jumps and Dashes!
